dict.string: After confirming your payment, we will issue you a unique Payment Code number
Note down your Payment Code and total amount. Donâ€™t worry, we will also mail you a copy of the payment instructions
Go to an Indomaret store near you and provide the cashier with the Payment Code number or barcode to be scanned.
The cashier will then confirm the transaction by asking for the transaction amount and the merchant name
Confirm the payment with the cashier
Your transaction is successful! You should be receiving an email confirming your payment. Please keep your Indomaret payment receipt just in case you need help via support
